Coons proposed a 5 percent property tax: raising the average annual tax bill by $16 to $342. The County Council voted 12-1 for the budget and then voted 9-4 to set the higher tax rate.
Coons proposed a 17: 5 percent increase in property taxes in 2007, increasing the average annual bill by $60 to $402. His budget also included $14 million in spending cuts and various measures to reduce expenses.
Coons has served as County Executive of: Del., since 2004 and has proposed property tax increases in 2006, 2007, and 2009.
